metadata.dc:author: Robles, O
metadata.dc:description: The purposes, objectives and strategies of WHO for the development of human resources are described and commented. The implication of this programme were emphasized in relation to the strategy of primary health care. The mediate and longterm plans are analyzed, underlining the fellowship activities and the training of academic personnel.
metadata.dc:title: El desarrollo de recursos humanos.
[Development of human resources].
